summary: A Canadian therapist has one last chance to keep his own personal life afloat by avoiding a job transfer to Gimli and working to help three patients suffering from extreme post-traumatic stress disorder.
cast: Jonas Chernick|Callum Keith Rennie|Michelle Nolden|Lindy Booth|Brianna Williams|Ross McMillan|Gordon Tanner|Kristen Harris|Lauren Ritz|Robert G. Slade|James Janssens|Suzanne Kelly
keywords: downward spiral|post traumatic stress|post traumatic stress disorder|group therapy|acute insomnia
title: Lucid
